sourcesContent:
// App.js
import './App.css';
import Navbar from './components/Navbar';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom';

// Define a simple Home component


function App() {
  return (
    <Router>
      Database Zoo Project

Trigger ideas (At least 2)
()




Different views
-3 logins
Customer
Employee
Manager


After logging in the Customer will be routed to profile page where they will update their profile information.Then routed to the home page where navigation bar will have: 
Tickets(where the customer will be able to either buy or view their tickets).
Donate(where the customer will be able to donate to the zoo)
*Maybe shop(where the customer will be able to shop souvenirs) 


After logging in the Employee will be routed to profile page where they will update their profileThen routed to the homepage where the navigation bar will have:
Enclosure(where the employee will be able to enter data about enclosure into entry forms like update the cleaning schedule)
Animal(which will have drop down with vet records and diets where employee will be able to enter vet records and diets of animals)
Orders(where employee can check customer orders like tickets to confirm if the customer bought the ticket)
After logging in the Manager will be routed to the home page where the navigation bar will have:
Enclosure(where the manager will be able to generate a report on the enclosure)
Animal(which will have drop down with vet records and diets where manager will be able to access vet records and diets of animals)
Orders(where manager can check customer orders like tickets to confirm if the customer bought the ticket)
Data reports(where the manager will be able to generate data reports of Employee hours worked,View donations of customers,amount of tickets placed on a certain day etc)to be continued



Data entry forms
Employee
Vet records
Diet

      <Routes>
        <Route path='/' exact /> 
        {/* Add more routes here */}
      </Routes>
    </Router>
  );
}

export default App;
